amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of Rules Committee Print 113-2 printed in House Report 113-10.

action.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mrs. McMorris Rodgers.
On agreeing to the McMorris Rodgers amendment (A001) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 166 - 257 (Roll no. 54).
